【官方解釋】

職業足球裁判聯會向天空體育解釋：「場上球證並不認為是犯規，經 VAR 覆核／決定亦非清楚及明顯錯判。」

「另外，VAR 亦非用作『二次裁判』，雖然（球員間）有接觸，但 VAR 認為不足以推翻入球。」

The Professional Game Match Officials Limited later explained to Sky Sports: "Firstly, the on-field referee didn’t think it was a foul and VAR checked/decided that it wasn’t a clear and obvious error to not award the foul.

"Secondly, VAR isn’t re-refereeing matches - there is contact but VAR was comfortable it wasn’t enough to disallow the goal."
